name: Overdose (itch) (elotroadri)
description:
Overcooked meets Breaking Bad.

Controls:

Player 1:
WASD: movement
E: Take and drop object
Q: Activate machine (hold it)

Player 2:
IJKL: movement
U: Take and drop object
O: Activate machine (hold it)
